description: MedTech service is an optional service of the Azure Health Data Services (AHDS) designed to ingest device data from multiple and disparate Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) devices and normalizes, groups, transforms, and persists device health data in the Fast Healthcare Interoperability Resources (FHIRÂ®) service.
summary: This template deploys MedTech service with the required resources and resource access permissions. MedTech service will still require device and FHIR destination mappings to be fully functional.
